ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 58
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/16/99 7:26:54 AM Central Daylight Time, EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/16/99 7:26:54 AM Central Daylight Time,
EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com writes:

<<
I just thought it'd be a neat idea to have 'name tags' on trade-made
products. Maybe not for cooking or brewing, as those items aren't meant
to last, but on generally anything else. Something in the status window
that says, "made by: name". Wouldn't that just be neat? Buy a banded
tunic 6 months from now with one of your secondary characters and say,
"hey! I made that!!" I'm not saying it's even possible for them to code
this, nor do I expect or really even want them to. I just think it's
kinda neat, that's all :) Too much coding for the effect it would
produce (or should I say lack of effect =P). Just, as I said, neat :)
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM >>

I think this would be such a great improvement to the role-playing
environment. Although, I agree, this could never be implemented. Along that
same thread, I would like for trades to have quality ratings (maybe along the
lines of slower decay if we had decay). It would be nice to see the High
Quality Banded Bracer made by HRE. ;-) Again, this will probably never see
the light of day

Hawkwin of Hawkwin's Roaming Emporium (HRE)
